title: Spinning Scars
description: Some legends are more than real.Others don’t want them to exist…Immortality can have its downfalls, especially when you’re a creature made of nightmares.Matthias just wants to live in peace after centuries of being hunted by the Others for what he is. Enrolling in a subdued college and hiding his true nature seems to be working. That is, until he meets Ruby, a beautiful college freshman who’s the opposite of peace. He’s thrown a curve ball when he discovers his unrelenting attraction to her, who she really is, and that they’re both in mortal danger. They’re being hunted, but for reasons Matthias has all wrong.
author: Alexia Purdy
